TopicTitle: Insane Rockets Division inspired me to do something...

Articles.Content:
And that was to take his first rocket from his first IRD episode and redo it. From there, I added more power, fuel, engines and not-really-smart building to it, until the thing finally clocked in at 1825 tons on the ground. I would've kept going, but the framerate was really taking a beating. This is a five-part series.

http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLv-TFFDKnxnj5UnPrespUS5VNbZYp-HA4

I welcome suggestions (unless it's get a new mic or recorder - I plan on changing both when I have the funds) comments and shoot, maybe I'll even do requests like "can you swap this out for that and record what happens".

At this point, I'm mostly chilling out waiting for 0.21 to roll in.
